it.polimi.group06briscola.model

Class Robot

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.group06briscola.model.Player
      • it.polimi.group06briscola.model.Robot

  • public class Robot
extends Player
    This class inherited from the Player class and it is used when a robot plays against a Human player . A robot hold hand card and based on the rules and AI strategy play card.
    Author:
    Roza .
